oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A nontangency-based sufficient condition for boundedness of orbits
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: BHAT, SP
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: lyapunov methods
dynamical system
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We give a Lyapunov test for the boundedness of orbits of a dynamical system. Unlike previous sufficient conditions for boundedness, our test does not require the Lyapunov function to be proper or weakly proper. Instead, our result uses a nontangency condition between the dynamics and the zero level set of the Lyapunov function.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Proceedings of the 42nd IEEE Conference on Decision and Control (V 6), Maui, USA, 9-12 December 2003, 5626-5627
